---
title: "Find your Nature's Notebook ID"
---

To maintain the privacy of contributions to this project, all observations are linked only to the Nature's Notebook ID.  These numbers can be found by following these instructions:

1) Log into [Nature's Notebook](https://www.usanpn.org//user/login?destination=MyNPN)
2) Click on "Visualize my data" in the "Enter Observations" box
    ![](img/NNid_1.png)
3) Get your Nature's Notebook ID from the URL (look in the address bar of your browser)
    ![](img/NNid_2.png)
